channel.title: Dance on Naresh Chaurasia
channel.description: Recent content in Dance on Naresh Chaurasia

item.title: Ballroom Dancing - JJ
item.description: 0. 10 Tips to Fred Astairedom 1. The Beat of the Music 2. Counting Music: Finding the Sets of 8 3. Downbeat and Upbeat 4. Rythm Patterns Marking Rythms Counting Step Patterns Posture and Dance Frame 8. Positions Movement ad Timing 10. Lead and Follow Step Pattern Dance will pull me out of Dark Shadows, where I have been hiding since ever, out of fear, shame and rejection. 0. 10 Tips to Fred Astairedom Repetition will set you free.

item.title: Daily Dance Schedule
item.description: Dance Schedule Feb 2023 Name Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Isolation Exercise X X X 20 Minutes: YouTube Video. Initially 20 Minutes looks like a lot. But when I go over the YoutTube Video 2 times, time flies, and I really enjoy it. Name Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Turns Y Y Y 15 Minutes 3 Salsa 2 Bachata Songs Name Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Waves X X X X X X X 10 Minutes 2 Songs you love

item.title: Hear the Beat, Feel the Music - JJ
item.description: Term Description mini-phrases the musical themes of the sets of 8 major phrase (Book) the musical themes of the sets of 8 (mini-phrases) can come together to form a bigger theme major phrase (Book Web) major phrase is a specific number of sets of 8. The most common major phrase is four sets of 8, which is 32 beats of music. phrase structure of music theme a set of 8 usually has a theme.
